text: Wo que yi paiqian wo de zhong shizhe, qu chuanda wo de xuduo mingzheng, bing jiang shi tian jing he gongping, yibian zhongren jin shou gongdao. Wo ceng chuangzao gangtie, qizhong you yanli de xingfa, duiyu zhongren meiyou xuduo bi yi; yibian an la zhidao zai mimi zhong xiangzhu ta he ta de zhong shizhe de ren. An la que shi zhi gang de, que shi wanneng de
